entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING, Brockville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:05 a.m. EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 8.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming north 20 km/h early this afternoon. High 8. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Ice pellets. Low minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening. 40 percent chance of ice pellets overnight. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming northeast 30 gusting to 50 late this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Freezing rain or rain. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Freezing rain or ice pellets changing to periods of rain in the afternoon. Risk of a thunderstorm in the afternoon. Local rainfall amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
